Addition and subtraction have the same precedence and associate left-to-right; the inner parentheses are unnecessary. The outer parentheses around the whole numerator remain to ensure division happens last.
Parentheses around the subscript expression are unnecessary; [] already groups the expression.
Parentheses around the entire RHS are unnecessary; assignment has lower precedence than +.
Multiplication already has higher precedence; these parentheses add no clarity.
